EmailTemplate.name: DM-2018-09-EMEA-PFL-Coffee and Mug Kits-UK.ES 2 - MetroStar Systems - English
EmailTemplate.subject: How MetroStar Continuously Optimizes Their AWS Environment with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects/metrostar-success-story]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Using Turbonomic, MetroStar Systems rapidly improved their environment in the background and simultaneously reduced their monthly AWS spend by 25%. Additionally, when the team needed to quickly analyze potential migrations, Turbonomic removed time, uncertainty, and risk out of the equation.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects/metrostar-success-story]]>
"It saves us thousands of dollars in the cloud every month and saves us hundreds of hours of labor a year across our entire estate." - John Belcher, Principal Infrastructure Engineer, MetroStar Systems
When you're ready, we'd love to show you how Turbonomic can identify performance risks before your customers do and save you at least 30% off your cloud bill.
Regards, Megan
P.S. In the meantime, I hope you'll enjoy a coffee on us. Keep an eye out!
